message: I'm excited to offer you this great product, and I think it's a fair price of $150. It's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality item at a competitive price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! While I appreciate the product, $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $85 for it.  Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $125. It's a fair price that I think you'll find reasonable.
Alice, $125 is still too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go above $95.  If you're willing to meet me there, I'm ready to buy it.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to compromise again, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $115. It's a good price that should make both of us happy.
Alice, I really want to get this product from you, but $115 is still above my limit.  I'm willing to go to $105.  That's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can close the deal.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go. I need to make a profit, and I think this is a fair price for both of us.
